submodule: openconfig-bgp-neighbor (belongs-to openconfig-bgp)

  grouping bgp-neighbor-config
    +-- peer-group?         -> ../../../../peer-groups/peer-group/peer-group-name
    +-- neighbor-address?   inet:ip-address
    +-- enabled?            boolean
  grouping bgp-neighbor-use-multiple-paths
    +-- use-multiple-paths
       +-- config
       |  +-- enabled?   boolean
       +--ro state
       |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
       +-- ebgp
          +-- config
          |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
          +--ro state
             +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
  grouping bgp-neighbor-state
    +-- session-state?             enumeration
    +-- last-established?          oc-types:timeticks64
    +-- established-transitions?   yang:counter64
    +-- supported-capabilities*    identityref
    +-- messages
    |  +-- sent
    |  |  +-- UPDATE?         uint64
    |  |  +-- NOTIFICATION?   uint64
    |  +-- received
    |     +-- UPDATE?         uint64
    |     +-- NOTIFICATION?   uint64
    +-- queues
       +-- input?    uint32
       +-- output?   uint32
  grouping bgp-neighbor-counters-message-types-state
    +-- UPDATE?         uint64
    +-- NOTIFICATION?   uint64
  grouping bgp-neighbor-queue-counters-state
    +-- input?    uint32
    +-- output?   uint32
  grouping bgp-neighbor-transport-state
    +-- local-port?       inet:port-number
    +-- remote-address?   inet:ip-address
    +-- remote-port?      inet:port-number
  grouping bgp-neighbor-error-handling-state
    +-- erroneous-update-messages?   uint32
  grouping bgp-neighbor-timers-state
    +-- negotiated-hold-time?   decimal64
  grouping bgp-neighbor-afi-safi-graceful-restart-state
    +-- received?     boolean
    +-- advertised?   boolean
  grouping bgp-neighbor-graceful-restart-state
    +-- peer-restart-time?   uint16
    +-- peer-restarting?     boolean
    +-- local-restarting?    boolean
    +-- mode?                enumeration
  grouping bgp-neighbor-afi-safi-state
    +-- active?     boolean
    +-- prefixes
       +-- received?    uint32
       +-- sent?        uint32
       +-- installed?   uint32
  grouping bgp-neighbor-afi-safi-list
    +-- afi-safi* [afi-safi-name]
       +-- afi-safi-name?          -> ../config/afi-safi-name
       +-- config
       |  +-- afi-safi-name?   identityref
       |  +-- enabled?         boolean
       +--ro state
       |  +--ro afi-safi-name?   identityref
       |  +--ro enabled?         boolean
       |  +--ro active?          boolean
       |  +--ro prefixes
       |     +--ro received?    uint32
       |     +--ro sent?        uint32
       |     +--ro installed?   uint32
       +-- graceful-restart
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro enabled?      boolean
       |     +--ro received?     boolean
       |     +--ro advertised?   boolean
       +-- apply-policy
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
       |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
       |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
       +-- ipv4-unicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |  |  +-- config
       |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |  |  +--ro state
       |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
       +-- ipv6-unicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |  |  +-- config
       |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |  |  +--ro state
       |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
       +-- ipv4-labeled-unicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- ipv6-labeled-unicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- l3vpn-ipv4-unicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- l3vpn-ipv6-unicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- l3vpn-ipv4-multicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- l3vpn-ipv6-multicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- l2vpn-vpls
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- l2vpn-evpn
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- use-multiple-paths
          +-- config
          |  +-- enabled?   boolean
          +--ro state
          |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
          +-- ebgp
             +-- config
             |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
             +--ro state
                +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
  grouping bgp-neighbor-base
    +-- config
    |  +-- peer-group?           -> ../../../../peer-groups/peer-group/peer-group-name
    |  +-- neighbor-address?     inet:ip-address
    |  +-- enabled?              boolean
    |  +-- peer-as?              inet:as-number
    |  +-- local-as?             inet:as-number
    |  +-- peer-type?            oc-bgp-types:peer-type
    |  +-- auth-password?        string
    |  +-- remove-private-as?    oc-bgp-types:remove-private-as-option
    |  +-- route-flap-damping?   boolean
    |  +-- send-community?       oc-bgp-types:community-type
    |  +-- description?          string
    +--ro state
    |  +--ro peer-group?                -> ../../../../peer-groups/peer-group/peer-group-name
    |  +--ro neighbor-address?          inet:ip-address
    |  +--ro enabled?                   boolean
    |  +--ro peer-as?                   inet:as-number
    |  +--ro local-as?                  inet:as-number
    |  +--ro peer-type?                 oc-bgp-types:peer-type
    |  +--ro auth-password?             string
    |  +--ro remove-private-as?         oc-bgp-types:remove-private-as-option
    |  +--ro route-flap-damping?        boolean
    |  +--ro send-community?            oc-bgp-types:community-type
    |  +--ro description?               string
    |  +--ro session-state?             enumeration
    |  +--ro last-established?          oc-types:timeticks64
    |  +--ro established-transitions?   yang:counter64
    |  +--ro supported-capabilities*    identityref
    |  +--ro messages
    |  |  +--ro sent
    |  |  |  +--ro UPDATE?         uint64
    |  |  |  +--ro NOTIFICATION?   uint64
    |  |  +--ro received
    |  |     +--ro UPDATE?         uint64
    |  |     +--ro NOTIFICATION?   uint64
    |  +--ro queues
    |     +--ro input?    uint32
    |     +--ro output?   uint32
    +-- timers
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- connect-retry?                    decimal64
    |  |  +-- hold-time?                        decimal64
    |  |  +-- keepalive-interval?               decimal64
    |  |  +-- minimum-advertisement-interval?   decimal64
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro connect-retry?                    decimal64
    |     +--ro hold-time?                        decimal64
    |     +--ro keepalive-interval?               decimal64
    |     +--ro minimum-advertisement-interval?   decimal64
    |     +--ro negotiated-hold-time?             decimal64
    +-- transport
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- tcp-mss?         uint16
    |  |  +-- mtu-discovery?   boolean
    |  |  +-- passive-mode?    boolean
    |  |  +-- local-address?   union
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro tcp-mss?          uint16
    |     +--ro mtu-discovery?    boolean
    |     +--ro passive-mode?     boolean
    |     +--ro local-address?    union
    |     +--ro local-port?       inet:port-number
    |     +--ro remote-address?   inet:ip-address
    |     +--ro remote-port?      inet:port-number
    +-- error-handling
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- treat-as-withdraw?   boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro treat-as-withdraw?           boolean
    |     +--ro erroneous-update-messages?   uint32
    +-- graceful-restart
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- enabled?             boolean
    |  |  +-- restart-time?        uint16
    |  |  +-- stale-routes-time?   decimal64
    |  |  +-- helper-only?         boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro enabled?             boolean
    |     +--ro restart-time?        uint16
    |     +--ro stale-routes-time?   decimal64
    |     +--ro helper-only?         boolean
    |     +--ro peer-restart-time?   uint16
    |     +--ro peer-restarting?     boolean
    |     +--ro local-restarting?    boolean
    |     +--ro mode?                enumeration
    +-- logging-options
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
    +-- ebgp-multihop
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- enabled?        boolean
    |  |  +-- multihop-ttl?   uint8
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro enabled?        boolean
    |     +--ro multihop-ttl?   uint8
    +-- route-reflector
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
    |  |  +-- route-reflector-client?       boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
    |     +--ro route-reflector-client?       boolean
    +-- as-path-options
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- allow-own-as?      uint8
    |  |  +-- replace-peer-as?   boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro allow-own-as?      uint8
    |     +--ro replace-peer-as?   boolean
    +-- add-paths
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- receive?                  boolean
    |  |  +-- send-max?                 uint8
    |  |  +-- eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro receive?                  boolean
    |     +--ro send-max?                 uint8
    |     +--ro eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    +-- use-multiple-paths
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |  |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
    |  +-- ebgp
    |     +-- config
    |     |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
    |     +--ro state
    |        +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
    +-- apply-policy
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
    |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
    |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
    +-- afi-safis
       +-- afi-safi* [afi-safi-name]
          +-- afi-safi-name?          -> ../config/afi-safi-name
          +-- config
          |  +-- afi-safi-name?   identityref
          |  +-- enabled?         boolean
          +--ro state
          |  +--ro afi-safi-name?   identityref
          |  +--ro enabled?         boolean
          |  +--ro active?          boolean
          |  +--ro prefixes
          |     +--ro received?    uint32
          |     +--ro sent?        uint32
          |     +--ro installed?   uint32
          +-- graceful-restart
          |  +-- config
          |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
          |  +--ro state
          |     +--ro enabled?      boolean
          |     +--ro received?     boolean
          |     +--ro advertised?   boolean
          +-- apply-policy
          |  +-- config
          |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
          |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
          |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
          |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
          |  +--ro state
          |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
          |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
          |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
          |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
          +-- ipv4-unicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |  |  +-- config
          |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |  |  +--ro state
          |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          |  +-- config
          |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
          |  +--ro state
          |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
          +-- ipv6-unicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |  |  +-- config
          |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |  |  +--ro state
          |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          |  +-- config
          |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
          |  +--ro state
          |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
          +-- ipv4-labeled-unicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- ipv6-labeled-unicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- l3vpn-ipv4-unicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- l3vpn-ipv6-unicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- l3vpn-ipv4-multicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- l3vpn-ipv6-multicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- l2vpn-vpls
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- l2vpn-evpn
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- use-multiple-paths
             +-- config
             |  +-- enabled?   boolean
             +--ro state
             |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
             +-- ebgp
                +-- config
                |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                +--ro state
                   +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
  grouping bgp-neighbor-list
    +-- neighbor* [neighbor-address]
       +-- neighbor-address?     -> ../config/neighbor-address
       +-- config
       |  +-- peer-group?           -> ../../../../peer-groups/peer-group/peer-group-name
       |  +-- neighbor-address?     inet:ip-address
       |  +-- enabled?              boolean
       |  +-- peer-as?              inet:as-number
       |  +-- local-as?             inet:as-number
       |  +-- peer-type?            oc-bgp-types:peer-type
       |  +-- auth-password?        string
       |  +-- remove-private-as?    oc-bgp-types:remove-private-as-option
       |  +-- route-flap-damping?   boolean
       |  +-- send-community?       oc-bgp-types:community-type
       |  +-- description?          string
       +--ro state
       |  +--ro peer-group?                -> ../../../../peer-groups/peer-group/peer-group-name
       |  +--ro neighbor-address?          inet:ip-address
       |  +--ro enabled?                   boolean
       |  +--ro peer-as?                   inet:as-number
       |  +--ro local-as?                  inet:as-number
       |  +--ro peer-type?                 oc-bgp-types:peer-type
       |  +--ro auth-password?             string
       |  +--ro remove-private-as?         oc-bgp-types:remove-private-as-option
       |  +--ro route-flap-damping?        boolean
       |  +--ro send-community?            oc-bgp-types:community-type
       |  +--ro description?               string
       |  +--ro session-state?             enumeration
       |  +--ro last-established?          oc-types:timeticks64
       |  +--ro established-transitions?   yang:counter64
       |  +--ro supported-capabilities*    identityref
       |  +--ro messages
       |  |  +--ro sent
       |  |  |  +--ro UPDATE?         uint64
       |  |  |  +--ro NOTIFICATION?   uint64
       |  |  +--ro received
       |  |     +--ro UPDATE?         uint64
       |  |     +--ro NOTIFICATION?   uint64
       |  +--ro queues
       |     +--ro input?    uint32
       |     +--ro output?   uint32
       +-- timers
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- connect-retry?                    decimal64
       |  |  +-- hold-time?                        decimal64
       |  |  +-- keepalive-interval?               decimal64
       |  |  +-- minimum-advertisement-interval?   decimal64
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro connect-retry?                    decimal64
       |     +--ro hold-time?                        decimal64
       |     +--ro keepalive-interval?               decimal64
       |     +--ro minimum-advertisement-interval?   decimal64
       |     +--ro negotiated-hold-time?             decimal64
       +-- transport
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- tcp-mss?         uint16
       |  |  +-- mtu-discovery?   boolean
       |  |  +-- passive-mode?    boolean
       |  |  +-- local-address?   union
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro tcp-mss?          uint16
       |     +--ro mtu-discovery?    boolean
       |     +--ro passive-mode?     boolean
       |     +--ro local-address?    union
       |     +--ro local-port?       inet:port-number
       |     +--ro remote-address?   inet:ip-address
       |     +--ro remote-port?      inet:port-number
       +-- error-handling
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- treat-as-withdraw?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro treat-as-withdraw?           boolean
       |     +--ro erroneous-update-messages?   uint32
       +-- graceful-restart
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- enabled?             boolean
       |  |  +-- restart-time?        uint16
       |  |  +-- stale-routes-time?   decimal64
       |  |  +-- helper-only?         boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro enabled?             boolean
       |     +--ro restart-time?        uint16
       |     +--ro stale-routes-time?   decimal64
       |     +--ro helper-only?         boolean
       |     +--ro peer-restart-time?   uint16
       |     +--ro peer-restarting?     boolean
       |     +--ro local-restarting?    boolean
       |     +--ro mode?                enumeration
       +-- logging-options
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
       +-- ebgp-multihop
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- enabled?        boolean
       |  |  +-- multihop-ttl?   uint8
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro enabled?        boolean
       |     +--ro multihop-ttl?   uint8
       +-- route-reflector
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
       |  |  +-- route-reflector-client?       boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
       |     +--ro route-reflector-client?       boolean
       +-- as-path-options
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- allow-own-as?      uint8
       |  |  +-- replace-peer-as?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro allow-own-as?      uint8
       |     +--ro replace-peer-as?   boolean
       +-- add-paths
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- receive?                  boolean
       |  |  +-- send-max?                 uint8
       |  |  +-- eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro receive?                  boolean
       |     +--ro send-max?                 uint8
       |     +--ro eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       +-- use-multiple-paths
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |  |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
       |  +-- ebgp
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
       +-- apply-policy
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
       |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
       |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
       +-- afi-safis
          +-- afi-safi* [afi-safi-name]
             +-- afi-safi-name?          -> ../config/afi-safi-name
             +-- config
             |  +-- afi-safi-name?   identityref
             |  +-- enabled?         boolean
             +--ro state
             |  +--ro afi-safi-name?   identityref
             |  +--ro enabled?         boolean
             |  +--ro active?          boolean
             |  +--ro prefixes
             |     +--ro received?    uint32
             |     +--ro sent?        uint32
             |     +--ro installed?   uint32
             +-- graceful-restart
             |  +-- config
             |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
             |  +--ro state
             |     +--ro enabled?      boolean
             |     +--ro received?     boolean
             |     +--ro advertised?   boolean
             +-- apply-policy
             |  +-- config
             |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
             |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
             |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
             |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
             |  +--ro state
             |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
             |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
             |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
             |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
             +-- ipv4-unicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |  |  +-- config
             |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |  |  +--ro state
             |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             |  +-- config
             |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
             |  +--ro state
             |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
             +-- ipv6-unicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |  |  +-- config
             |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |  |  +--ro state
             |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             |  +-- config
             |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
             |  +--ro state
             |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
             +-- ipv4-labeled-unicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- ipv6-labeled-unicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- l3vpn-ipv4-unicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- l3vpn-ipv6-unicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- l3vpn-ipv4-multicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- l3vpn-ipv6-multicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- l2vpn-vpls
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- l2vpn-evpn
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- use-multiple-paths
                +-- config
                |  +-- enabled?   boolean
                +--ro state
                |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
                +-- ebgp
                   +-- config
                   |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
                   +--ro state
                      +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
  grouping bgp-common-neighbor-group-timers-config
    +-- connect-retry?                    decimal64
    +-- hold-time?                        decimal64
    +-- keepalive-interval?               decimal64
    +-- minimum-advertisement-interval?   decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-neighbor-group-config
    +-- peer-as?              inet:as-number
    +-- local-as?             inet:as-number
    +-- peer-type?            oc-bgp-types:peer-type
    +-- auth-password?        string
    +-- remove-private-as?    oc-bgp-types:remove-private-as-option
    +-- route-flap-damping?   boolean
    +-- send-community?       oc-bgp-types:community-type
    +-- description?          string
  grouping bgp-common-neighbor-group-transport-config
    +-- tcp-mss?         uint16
    +-- mtu-discovery?   boolean
    +-- passive-mode?    boolean
    +-- local-address?   union
  grouping bgp-common-neighbor-group-error-handling-config
    +-- treat-as-withdraw?   boolean
  grouping bgp-common-neighbor-group-logging-options-config
    +-- log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
  grouping bgp-common-neighbor-group-multihop-config
    +-- enabled?        boolean
    +-- multihop-ttl?   uint8
  grouping bgp-common-neighbor-group-route-reflector-config
    +-- route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
    +-- route-reflector-client?       boolean
  grouping bgp-common-neighbor-group-as-path-options-config
    +-- allow-own-as?      uint8
    +-- replace-peer-as?   boolean
  grouping bgp-common-neighbor-group-add-paths-config
    +-- receive?                  boolean
    +-- send-max?                 uint8
    +-- eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
  grouping bgp-common-graceful-restart-config
    +-- enabled?             boolean
    +-- restart-time?        uint16
    +-- stale-routes-time?   decimal64
    +-- helper-only?         boolean
  grouping bgp-common-use-multiple-paths-config
    +-- enabled?   boolean
  grouping bgp-common-use-multiple-paths-ebgp-as-options-config
    +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
  grouping bgp-common-global-group-use-multiple-paths
    +-- use-multiple-paths
       +-- config
       |  +-- enabled?   boolean
       +--ro state
       |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
       +-- ebgp
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
       |  |  +-- maximum-paths?       uint32
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
       |     +--ro maximum-paths?       uint32
       +-- ibgp
          +-- config
          |  +-- maximum-paths?   uint32
          +--ro state
             +--ro maximum-paths?   uint32
  grouping bgp-common-use-multiple-paths-ebgp-config
    +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
    +-- maximum-paths?       uint32
  grouping bgp-common-use-multiple-paths-ibgp-config
    +-- maximum-paths?   uint32
  grouping bgp-common-route-selection-options-config
    +-- always-compare-med?           boolean
    +-- ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
    +-- external-compare-router-id?   boolean
    +-- advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
    +-- enable-aigp?                  boolean
    +-- ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
  grouping bgp-common-route-selection-options
    +-- route-selection-options
       +-- config
       |  +-- always-compare-med?           boolean
       |  +-- ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
       |  +-- external-compare-router-id?   boolean
       |  +-- advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
       |  +-- enable-aigp?                  boolean
       |  +-- ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
       +--ro state
          +--ro always-compare-med?           boolean
          +--ro ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
          +--ro external-compare-router-id?   boolean
          +--ro advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
          +--ro enable-aigp?                  boolean
          +--ro ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
  grouping bgp-common-state
    +-- total-paths?      uint32
    +-- total-prefixes?   uint32
  grouping bgp-common-mp-afi-safi-graceful-restart-config
    +-- enabled?   boolean
  grouping bgp-common-mp-afi-safi-config
    +-- afi-safi-name?   identityref
    +-- enabled?         boolean
  grouping bgp-common-mp-all-afi-safi-list-contents
    +-- apply-policy
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
    |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
    |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
    +-- ipv4-unicast
    |  +-- prefix-limit
    |  |  +-- config
    |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
    |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
    |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
    |  |  +--ro state
    |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
    |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
    |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
    +-- ipv6-unicast
    |  +-- prefix-limit
    |  |  +-- config
    |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
    |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
    |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
    |  |  +--ro state
    |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
    |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
    |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
    +-- ipv4-labeled-unicast
    |  +-- prefix-limit
    |     +-- config
    |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
    |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
    |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
    |     +--ro state
    |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32

    |     +--ro state
    |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32

       +-- prefix-limit
