          |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          +--ro state
             +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-mp-l3vpn-ipv4-unicast-group
    +-- l3vpn-ipv4-unicast
       +-- prefix-limit
          +-- config
          |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          +--ro state
             +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-mp-l3vpn-ipv6-unicast-group
    +-- l3vpn-ipv6-unicast
       +-- prefix-limit
          +-- config
          |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          +--ro state
             +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-mp-l3vpn-ipv4-multicast-group
    +-- l3vpn-ipv4-multicast
       +-- prefix-limit
          +-- config
          |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          +--ro state
             +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-mp-l3vpn-ipv6-multicast-group
    +-- l3vpn-ipv6-multicast
       +-- prefix-limit
          +-- config
          |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          +--ro state
             +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-mp-l2vpn-vpls-group
    +-- l2vpn-vpls
       +-- prefix-limit
          +-- config
          |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          +--ro state
             +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-mp-l2vpn-evpn-group
    +-- l2vpn-evpn
       +-- prefix-limit
          +-- config
          |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          +--ro state
             +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-mp-all-afi-safi-common
    +-- prefix-limit
       +-- config
       |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       +--ro state
          +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-mp-ipv4-ipv6-unicast-common
    +-- prefix-limit
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
    |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
    |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
    |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
    |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
    +-- config
    |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
    +--ro state
       +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
  grouping bgp-common-mp-l3vpn-ipv4-ipv6-unicast-common
    +-- prefix-limit
       +-- config
       |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       +--ro state
          +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-mp-l3vpn-ipv4-ipv6-multicast-common
    +-- prefix-limit
       +-- config
       |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       +--ro state
          +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-mp-l2vpn-common
    +-- prefix-limit
       +-- config
       |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       +--ro state
          +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-mp-all-afi-safi-common-prefix-limit-config
    +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
    +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
    +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-mp-ipv4-ipv6-unicast-common-config
    +-- send-default-route?   boolean
  grouping bgp-peer-group-config
    +-- peer-group-name?   string
  grouping bgp-peer-group-afi-safi-list
    +-- afi-safi* [afi-safi-name]
       +-- afi-safi-name?             -> ../config/afi-safi-name
       +-- config
       |  +-- afi-safi-name?   identityref
       |  +-- enabled?         boolean
       +--ro state
       |  +--ro afi-safi-name?   identityref
       |  +--ro enabled?         boolean
       +-- graceful-restart
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro enabled?   boolean
       +-- route-selection-options
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- always-compare-med?           boolean
       |  |  +-- ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
       |  |  +-- external-compare-router-id?   boolean
       |  |  +-- advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
       |  |  +-- enable-aigp?                  boolean
       |  |  +-- ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro always-compare-med?           boolean
       |     +--ro ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
       |     +--ro external-compare-router-id?   boolean
       |     +--ro advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
       |     +--ro enable-aigp?                  boolean
       |     +--ro ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
       +-- use-multiple-paths
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |  |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
       |  +-- ebgp
       |  |  +-- config
       |  |  |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
       |  |  |  +-- maximum-paths?       uint32
       |  |  +--ro state
       |  |     +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
       |  |     +--ro maximum-paths?       uint32
       |  +-- ibgp
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- maximum-paths?   uint32
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro maximum-paths?   uint32
       +-- apply-policy
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
       |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
       |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
       +-- ipv4-unicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |  |  +-- config
       |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |  |  +--ro state
       |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
       +-- ipv6-unicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |  |  +-- config
       |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |  |  +--ro state
       |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
       +-- ipv4-labeled-unicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- ipv6-labeled-unicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- l3vpn-ipv4-unicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- l3vpn-ipv6-unicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- l3vpn-ipv4-multicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- l3vpn-ipv6-multicast
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- l2vpn-vpls
       |  +-- prefix-limit
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
       |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
       |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
       |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
       +-- l2vpn-evpn
          +-- prefix-limit
             +-- config
             |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             +--ro state
                +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-peer-group-base
    +-- config
    |  +-- peer-group-name?      string
    |  +-- peer-as?              inet:as-number
    |  +-- local-as?             inet:as-number
    |  +-- peer-type?            oc-bgp-types:peer-type
    |  +-- auth-password?        string
    |  +-- remove-private-as?    oc-bgp-types:remove-private-as-option
    |  +-- route-flap-damping?   boolean
    |  +-- send-community?       oc-bgp-types:community-type
    |  +-- description?          string
    +--ro state
    |  +--ro peer-group-name?      string
    |  +--ro peer-as?              inet:as-number
    |  +--ro local-as?             inet:as-number
    |  +--ro peer-type?            oc-bgp-types:peer-type
    |  +--ro auth-password?        string
    |  +--ro remove-private-as?    oc-bgp-types:remove-private-as-option
    |  +--ro route-flap-damping?   boolean
    |  +--ro send-community?       oc-bgp-types:community-type
    |  +--ro description?          string
    |  +--ro total-paths?          uint32
    |  +--ro total-prefixes?       uint32
    +-- timers
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- connect-retry?                    decimal64
    |  |  +-- hold-time?                        decimal64
    |  |  +-- keepalive-interval?               decimal64
    |  |  +-- minimum-advertisement-interval?   decimal64
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro connect-retry?                    decimal64
    |     +--ro hold-time?                        decimal64
    |     +--ro keepalive-interval?               decimal64
    |     +--ro minimum-advertisement-interval?   decimal64
    +-- transport
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- tcp-mss?         uint16
    |  |  +-- mtu-discovery?   boolean
    |  |  +-- passive-mode?    boolean
    |  |  +-- local-address?   union
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro tcp-mss?         uint16
    |     +--ro mtu-discovery?   boolean
    |     +--ro passive-mode?    boolean
    |     +--ro local-address?   union
    +-- error-handling
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- treat-as-withdraw?   boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro treat-as-withdraw?   boolean
    +-- graceful-restart
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- enabled?             boolean
    |  |  +-- restart-time?        uint16
    |  |  +-- stale-routes-time?   decimal64
    |  |  +-- helper-only?         boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro enabled?             boolean
    |     +--ro restart-time?        uint16
    |     +--ro stale-routes-time?   decimal64
    |     +--ro helper-only?         boolean
    +-- logging-options
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
    +-- ebgp-multihop
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- enabled?        boolean
    |  |  +-- multihop-ttl?   uint8
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro enabled?        boolean
    |     +--ro multihop-ttl?   uint8
    +-- route-reflector
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
    |  |  +-- route-reflector-client?       boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
    |     +--ro route-reflector-client?       boolean
    +-- as-path-options
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- allow-own-as?      uint8
    |  |  +-- replace-peer-as?   boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro allow-own-as?      uint8
    |     +--ro replace-peer-as?   boolean
    +-- add-paths
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- receive?                  boolean
    |  |  +-- send-max?                 uint8
    |  |  +-- eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro receive?                  boolean
    |     +--ro send-max?                 uint8
    |     +--ro eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    +-- use-multiple-paths
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
    |  +--ro state
    |  |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
    |  +-- ebgp
    |  |  +-- config
    |  |  |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
    |  |  |  +-- maximum-paths?       uint32
    |  |  +--ro state
    |  |     +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
    |  |     +--ro maximum-paths?       uint32
    |  +-- ibgp
    |     +-- config
    |     |  +-- maximum-paths?   uint32
    |     +--ro state
    |        +--ro maximum-paths?   uint32
    +-- apply-policy
    |  +-- config
    |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
    |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
    |  +--ro state
    |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
    |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
    |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
    +-- afi-safis
       +-- afi-safi* [afi-safi-name]
          +-- afi-safi-name?             -> ../config/afi-safi-name
          +-- config
          |  +-- afi-safi-name?   identityref
          |  +-- enabled?         boolean
          +--ro state
          |  +--ro afi-safi-name?   identityref
          |  +--ro enabled?         boolean
          +-- graceful-restart
          |  +-- config
          |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
          |  +--ro state
          |     +--ro enabled?   boolean
          +-- route-selection-options
          |  +-- config
          |  |  +-- always-compare-med?           boolean
          |  |  +-- ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
          |  |  +-- external-compare-router-id?   boolean
          |  |  +-- advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
          |  |  +-- enable-aigp?                  boolean
          |  |  +-- ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
          |  +--ro state
          |     +--ro always-compare-med?           boolean
          |     +--ro ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
          |     +--ro external-compare-router-id?   boolean
          |     +--ro advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
          |     +--ro enable-aigp?                  boolean
          |     +--ro ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
          +-- use-multiple-paths
          |  +-- config
          |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
          |  +--ro state
          |  |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
          |  +-- ebgp
          |  |  +-- config
          |  |  |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
          |  |  |  +-- maximum-paths?       uint32
          |  |  +--ro state
          |  |     +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
          |  |     +--ro maximum-paths?       uint32
          |  +-- ibgp
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- maximum-paths?   uint32
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro maximum-paths?   uint32
          +-- apply-policy
          |  +-- config
          |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
          |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
          |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
          |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
          |  +--ro state
          |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
          |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
          |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
          |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
          +-- ipv4-unicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |  |  +-- config
          |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |  |  +--ro state
          |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          |  +-- config
          |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
          |  +--ro state
          |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
          +-- ipv6-unicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |  |  +-- config
          |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |  |  +--ro state
          |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          |  +-- config
          |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
          |  +--ro state
          |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
          +-- ipv4-labeled-unicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- ipv6-labeled-unicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- l3vpn-ipv4-unicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- l3vpn-ipv6-unicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- l3vpn-ipv4-multicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- l3vpn-ipv6-multicast
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- l2vpn-vpls
          |  +-- prefix-limit
          |     +-- config
          |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
          |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
          |     +--ro state
          |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
          |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
          |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
          +-- l2vpn-evpn
             +-- prefix-limit
                +-- config
                |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                +--ro state
                   +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                   +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-peer-group-list
    +-- peer-group* [peer-group-name]
       +-- peer-group-name?      -> ../config/peer-group-name
       +-- config
       |  +-- peer-group-name?      string
       |  +-- peer-as?              inet:as-number
       |  +-- local-as?             inet:as-number
       |  +-- peer-type?            oc-bgp-types:peer-type
       |  +-- auth-password?        string
       |  +-- remove-private-as?    oc-bgp-types:remove-private-as-option
       |  +-- route-flap-damping?   boolean
       |  +-- send-community?       oc-bgp-types:community-type
       |  +-- description?          string
       +--ro state
       |  +--ro peer-group-name?      string
       |  +--ro peer-as?              inet:as-number
       |  +--ro local-as?             inet:as-number
       |  +--ro peer-type?            oc-bgp-types:peer-type
       |  +--ro auth-password?        string
       |  +--ro remove-private-as?    oc-bgp-types:remove-private-as-option
       |  +--ro route-flap-damping?   boolean
       |  +--ro send-community?       oc-bgp-types:community-type
       |  +--ro description?          string
       |  +--ro total-paths?          uint32
       |  +--ro total-prefixes?       uint32
       +-- timers
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- connect-retry?                    decimal64
       |  |  +-- hold-time?                        decimal64
       |  |  +-- keepalive-interval?               decimal64
       |  |  +-- minimum-advertisement-interval?   decimal64
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro connect-retry?                    decimal64
       |     +--ro hold-time?                        decimal64
       |     +--ro keepalive-interval?               decimal64
       |     +--ro minimum-advertisement-interval?   decimal64
       +-- transport
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- tcp-mss?         uint16
       |  |  +-- mtu-discovery?   boolean
       |  |  +-- passive-mode?    boolean
       |  |  +-- local-address?   union
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro tcp-mss?         uint16
       |     +--ro mtu-discovery?   boolean
       |     +--ro passive-mode?    boolean
       |     +--ro local-address?   union
       +-- error-handling
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- treat-as-withdraw?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro treat-as-withdraw?   boolean
       +-- graceful-restart
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- enabled?             boolean
       |  |  +-- restart-time?        uint16
       |  |  +-- stale-routes-time?   decimal64
       |  |  +-- helper-only?         boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro enabled?             boolean
       |     +--ro restart-time?        uint16
       |     +--ro stale-routes-time?   decimal64
       |     +--ro helper-only?         boolean
       +-- logging-options
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
       +-- ebgp-multihop
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- enabled?        boolean
       |  |  +-- multihop-ttl?   uint8
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro enabled?        boolean
       |     +--ro multihop-ttl?   uint8
       +-- route-reflector
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
       |  |  +-- route-reflector-client?       boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
       |     +--ro route-reflector-client?       boolean
       +-- as-path-options
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- allow-own-as?      uint8
       |  |  +-- replace-peer-as?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro allow-own-as?      uint8
       |     +--ro replace-peer-as?   boolean
       +-- add-paths
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- receive?                  boolean
       |  |  +-- send-max?                 uint8
       |  |  +-- eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro receive?                  boolean
       |     +--ro send-max?                 uint8
       |     +--ro eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       +-- use-multiple-paths
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
       |  +--ro state
       |  |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
       |  +-- ebgp
       |  |  +-- config
       |  |  |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
       |  |  |  +-- maximum-paths?       uint32
       |  |  +--ro state
       |  |     +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
       |  |     +--ro maximum-paths?       uint32
       |  +-- ibgp
       |     +-- config
       |     |  +-- maximum-paths?   uint32
       |     +--ro state
       |        +--ro maximum-paths?   uint32
       +-- apply-policy
       |  +-- config
       |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
       |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
       |  +--ro state
       |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
       |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
       +-- afi-safis
          +-- afi-safi* [afi-safi-name]
             +-- afi-safi-name?             -> ../config/afi-safi-name
             +-- config
             |  +-- afi-safi-name?   identityref
             |  +-- enabled?         boolean
             +--ro state
             |  +--ro afi-safi-name?   identityref
             |  +--ro enabled?         boolean
             +-- graceful-restart
             |  +-- config
             |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
             |  +--ro state
             |     +--ro enabled?   boolean
             +-- route-selection-options
             |  +-- config
             |  |  +-- always-compare-med?           boolean
             |  |  +-- ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
             |  |  +-- external-compare-router-id?   boolean
             |  |  +-- advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
             |  |  +-- enable-aigp?                  boolean
             |  |  +-- ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
             |  +--ro state
             |     +--ro always-compare-med?           boolean
             |     +--ro ignore-as-path-length?        boolean
             |     +--ro external-compare-router-id?   boolean
             |     +--ro advertise-inactive-routes?    boolean
             |     +--ro enable-aigp?                  boolean
             |     +--ro ignore-next-hop-igp-metric?   boolean
             +-- use-multiple-paths
             |  +-- config
             |  |  +-- enabled?   boolean
             |  +--ro state
             |  |  +--ro enabled?   boolean
             |  +-- ebgp
             |  |  +-- config
             |  |  |  +-- allow-multiple-as?   boolean
             |  |  |  +-- maximum-paths?       uint32
             |  |  +--ro state
             |  |     +--ro allow-multiple-as?   boolean
             |  |     +--ro maximum-paths?       uint32
             |  +-- ibgp
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- maximum-paths?   uint32
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro maximum-paths?   uint32
             +-- apply-policy
             |  +-- config
             |  |  +-- import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
             |  |  +-- default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
             |  |  +-- export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
             |  |  +-- default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
             |  +--ro state
             |     +--ro import-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
             |     +--ro default-import-policy?   default-policy-type
             |     +--ro export-policy*           -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
             |     +--ro default-export-policy?   default-policy-type
             +-- ipv4-unicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |  |  +-- config
             |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |  |  +--ro state
             |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             |  +-- config
             |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
             |  +--ro state
             |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
             +-- ipv6-unicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |  |  +-- config
             |  |  |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |  |  |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |  |  |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |  |  +--ro state
             |  |     +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |  |     +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |  |     +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             |  +-- config
             |  |  +-- send-default-route?   boolean
             |  +--ro state
             |     +--ro send-default-route?   boolean
             +-- ipv4-labeled-unicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- ipv6-labeled-unicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- l3vpn-ipv4-unicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- l3vpn-ipv6-unicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- l3vpn-ipv4-multicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- l3vpn-ipv6-multicast
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- l2vpn-vpls
             |  +-- prefix-limit
             |     +-- config
             |     |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
             |     |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |     |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
             |     +--ro state
             |        +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
             |        +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
             |        +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
             +-- l2vpn-evpn
                +-- prefix-limit
                   +-- config
                   |  +-- max-prefixes?             uint32
                   |  +-- shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                   |  +-- restart-timer?            decimal64
                   +--ro state
                      +--ro max-prefixes?             uint32
                      +--ro shutdown-threshold-pct?   oc-types:percentage
                      +--ro restart-timer?            decimal64
  grouping bgp-common-structure-neighbor-group-logging-options
    +-- logging-options
       +-- config
       |  +-- log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
       +--ro state
          +--ro log-neighbor-state-changes?   boolean
  grouping bgp-common-structure-neighbor-group-ebgp-multihop
    +-- ebgp-multihop
       +-- config
       |  +-- enabled?        boolean
       |  +-- multihop-ttl?   uint8
       +--ro state
          +--ro enabled?        boolean
          +--ro multihop-ttl?   uint8
  grouping bgp-common-structure-neighbor-group-route-reflector
    +-- route-reflector
       +-- config
       |  +-- route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
       |  +-- route-reflector-client?       boolean
       +--ro state
          +--ro route-reflector-cluster-id?   oc-bgp-types:rr-cluster-id-type
          +--ro route-reflector-client?       boolean
  grouping bgp-common-structure-neighbor-group-as-path-options
    +-- as-path-options
       +-- config
       |  +-- allow-own-as?      uint8
       |  +-- replace-peer-as?   boolean
       +--ro state
          +--ro allow-own-as?      uint8
          +--ro replace-peer-as?   boolean
  grouping bgp-common-structure-neighbor-group-add-paths
    +-- add-paths
       +-- config
       |  +-- receive?                  boolean
       |  +-- send-max?                 uint8
       |  +-- eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
       +--ro state
          +--ro receive?                  boolean
          +--ro send-max?                 uint8
          +--ro eligible-prefix-policy?   -> /oc-rpol:routing-policy/policy-definitions/policy-definition/name
